verses.roman:
loka-hita lāgi' tomāra saba vyavahāra
āmi saba nā jāni gambhīra hṛdaya tomāra"

synonyms: loka-hita lāgi'-for the benefit of people in general; tomāra—Your; saba—all; vyavahāra—activities; āmi saba—all of us; nā jāni—cannot understand; gambhīra—very deep and grave; hṛdaya—heart; tomāra—Your.
translation: "All Your activities are for the benefit of people in general. We cannot understand them, for Your intentions are deep and grave."
